about_the_game:
The Backwars is a survival horror game that keeps you on edge at all times. Whether you’re playing alone or with friends, your only goal is to survive. Scavenge for food and water, build what you need to stay alive, and hide from the unspeakable horrors hunting you. Each level is packed with threats that force you to think fast and act faster.

Step into an unforgiving world where everything feels disturbingly real. The heavy atmosphere, eerie sounds, and gritty visuals pull you into a nightmare that won’t let go. Every item, object, or system in the game connects in ways that can surprise or terrify you. Nothing feels safe, and nowhere is truly secure.

The entities stalking you aren’t the only danger—other players can be just as deadly. Trust can get you killed, and alliances rarely last long. Whether you’re hiding in the dark, crafting tools, or fighting for your life, every moment is a gamble.

The Backwars offers different ways to play:

  • Face the horrors solo for the ultimate test of survival.

  • Team up in co-op mode to improve your chances—but beware of betrayal.

  • Go head-to-head in versus mode, where the only thing scarier than the monsters is each other.

  • Haunting Atmosphere: Realistic graphics and chilling sound design keep the tension high.

  • Survival at Any Cost: Manage food, water, and resources to stay alive.

  • Complex Interactions: Everything in the game can affect something else—use this to your advantage or suffer the consequences.

  • Dynamic Gameplay: The combination of players, creatures, and interactive systems ensures no two experiences are the same.

The Backwars doesn’t just challenge your skills—it tests your nerve. Will you survive the rooms? Or will the horrors break you first?
